thats 1 of his heres one of mine..
npcdrop = 1125 1 3125 1
mines the same way why doesnt it work! and how do u change the rate in which u get it? also how do i make it that u can spawn # 20000+? i edited the ::pickup from 10000 to 20000 everything else in cleint.java is 20000 ....

item.title: Prejects
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

[quote=“TranScape, post:8, topic:177462”]tutrial about adding mysql…

In server.java find this void:
Code:
Code:

public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) {

After that piece of code, add this:
Code:
Code:

Database.createConnection();

Now, you’re done with integrating your server with MySQL.

Here is one example of using MySQL with administrators.txt:

Search for this in client.java:
Code:

i did this look
public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) {
database.createConnection(); <-------------- in compiler is says that it cannot find symbol has a ^ below the d
clientHandler = new server();
(new Thread(clientHandler)).start();[/quote]

How does this have anything to do with the thread?

Read full topic

database.createConnection(); <-------------- in compiler is says that it cannot find symbol has a ^ below the d
clientHandler = new server();
(new Thread(clientHandler)).start();
